# CAM::SHAKE_SCRIPT_GLOBAL

## Summary
Apply a predefined shake globally to the rendered result of all active scripted cameras

## Parameters
* **STRING** shakeName
* **FLOAT** amplitudeScalar = 1: Can be used to increase or decrease the amplitude of the shake effect.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
CAM::SHAKE_SCRIPT_GLOBAL("HAND_SHAKE", 0.2);

Full list of cam shake types by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/camShakeTypesCompact.json
